object.property: The debug menu is used to diagnose problems with RabbitVCS itself
Show new version on the left side
Configure the program to resolve conflicted files.

Use the following macros to configure the merge tool: %base - The common ancestor of the two files to be merged. %mine - The file you modified in your working copy. %theirs - The file being merged into your working copy. %merged - The file to store the merged result.
